title: Development of highly effective growth strategies aiming at improving the content of carotenoids in Dunaliella salina IFDSAL-JY215
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Vítor Sousa, Filipe Maciel, António A. Vicente, Oscar Dias, Pedro Geada
Dunaliella salina is the most promising source of β-carotene. The traditional source of carotenoids for industrial applications is chemical synthesis. However, microalgal pigments present several advantages when compared with those...
